'''Mud brick stairs''' are a [[mud brick]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mud brick stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Mud Brick Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mud brick stairs generate as part of [[trail ruins]].
